data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Eugene Simon (1902): Descriptions de quelques Arachnides nouveaux de la section des Cribellates. Bulletin de la Societe entomologique de France 15: 240-243, URL: http://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/page/9281116#page/250/mode/1up
